summary: Encapsulates the configuration of a regridding operation for initial‑condition data, storing the chosen regridder type and any associated method arguments so that the regrid process can be executed with custom settings.
business_intent: Enable users of the MODFLOW 6 initial‑conditions package to flexibly transfer data onto a different spatial grid by specifying the regridder algorithm and aggregation method, improving workflow adaptability for groundwater model preparation.
